    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void androidPlay()
      When the Android get the turn 1 -> Search for the best possible cell 2 -> If no cell is found 3 -> Randomly search for a cell without an owner (vacant cell)
      Cell androidSearchForBestCell()
      Method to return the more interesting cell for the android-player
      void buttonClick(android.view.View view)
      When the 1-player or 2-player button is pressed
      void checkIfThereIsAWinner()
      Procedure to determine if the last play resulted in a winner
      void enabled_buttons(boolean enabled)
      Set all Buttons and radio buttons Enabled or Disabled according to received parameter
      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      protected void onResume() 
      protected void onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle outState)
      Storage of variables and arrays when a deletion due to UI change is about
      void playerClickACell(android.view.View view)
      When a player clicks on a cell 1 -> Check that the game is started (turn! = 0) 2 -> We get the index of the pressed cell 3 -> With this index we call playerSelectCell
      void playerSelectCell(Cell Cell)
      When a player selects a cell, 1 -> Check that the cell is not null 2 -> Check that the cell has no owner 3 -> Check that the game is started (turn! = 0) 4 -> We award to the cell as owner the player who has the turn 5 -> We put the corresponding color in the cell 6 -> Check if the play makes the player a winner 7 -> We calculate and update how many vacant cells are left 8 -> We switch to the next turn
      Cell searchCombOneAndroidOwner()
      Method to return a cell in combination with only one android-owner (if there are any)
      Cell searchForAndroidWinner()
      Method to return the cell that makes android winner
      Cell searchForPlayer1Winner()
      Method to return the cell that would make the player winner 1
      Cell searchMoreWeightCell()
      Method to return the vacant cell with more weight
      Cell searchRandomVacantCell()
      Method to return random vacant-cell
      Cell searchStrategicCell()
      Method to return a cell in two combinations with only one android-owner and the same vacant.
      void setColorToCell(Cell cell)
      Set color to the BackgroundColor of the ImageView of the cell Get the color of the cell owner player
      void shift_Change()
      Procedure to change the turn after each play
      void vacantCells()
      The vacant_Cells variable, counts the number of vacant cells Each time a cell is occupied, this procedure is called, which remains 1 Once subtracted 1, if the number of cells without owner is less than 1 the game is terminated.

      • playerSelectCell

        public void playerSelectCell(Cell Cell)
        When a player selects a cell, 1 -> Check that the cell is not null 2 -> Check that the cell has no owner 3 -> Check that the game is started (turn! = 0) 4 -> We award to the cell as owner the player who has the turn 5 -> We put the corresponding color in the cell 6 -> Check if the play makes the player a winner 7 -> We calculate and update how many vacant cells are left 8 -> We switch to the next turn

      • playerClickACell

        public void playerClickACell(android.view.View view)
        When a player clicks on a cell 1 -> Check that the game is started (turn! = 0) 2 -> We get the index of the pressed cell 3 -> With this index we call playerSelectCell

      • androidPlay

        public void androidPlay()
        When the Android get the turn 1 -> Search for the best possible cell 2 -> If no cell is found 3 -> Randomly search for a cell without an owner (vacant cell)

      • vacantCells

        public void vacantCells()
        The vacant_Cells variable, counts the number of vacant cells Each time a cell is occupied, this procedure is called, which remains 1 Once subtracted 1, if the number of cells without owner is less than 1 the game is terminated. turn is set to 0 and the buttons are Enabled

      • shift_Change

        public void shift_Change()
        Procedure to change the turn after each play
